r.d: This extension is a wrapper for libevent - event notification library.
r.n: - Fixed build with museum PHP versions. - Fixed PECL bug #22705 (event_set() resets event base to NULL). - Changed event_set(), event_buffer_new() and event_buffer_set_fd() to accept numerical file descriptors. - Added event_priority_set() (patch by Ruslan Osmanov). - Fixed build with 5_4.
